structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.catch_line: State Purchasing Agent; Examination Of Printing Bills
law.text: The state purchasing agent shall cause all the printing under the state printing contract to be examined and measured, and no bill for printing shall be allowed unless it is in strict conformity with such contract. He may employ an expert in printing to examine the bills for printing under such contract and perform such other clerical assistance as the state purchasing agent may require.
